summary: Mobile game app being converted to PWA with Cryonex branding
architectural_notes: Web app deployed on Internet Computer blockchain
PWA configuration needed: manifest.json, service worker, meta tags
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cryonex logo icon optimized for PWA with transparent background, showing the 'CX' letters with cyan glow and red lightning bolt (cryonex-icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
- Cryonex logo icon optimized for PWA with transparent background, showing the 'CX' letters with cyan glow and red lightning bolt (cryonex-icon-512.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Generate PWA icon images from the uploaded Cryonex logo (IMG_20260218_211452.png-1.jpg) in standard PWA sizes: 192x192px and 512x512px

new_feature_requests.summary: Convert web app to PWA with manifest, service worker, and offline capabilities
Configure PWA with Cryonex name and uploaded logo image
Update PWA manifest (frontend/public/manifest.json) to use 'Cryonex' as the app name and short_name
Update PWA manifest icons array to reference the newly generated Cryonex logo icons at 192x192 and 512x512 sizes
Update the PWA manifest theme_color and background_color to match the app's existing cyan/neon cyberpunk theme using the colors from index.css
Update index.html to reference the Cryonex app name in the title tag
Add Apple touch icon link in index.html pointing to the 512x512 generated Cryonex logo for iOS PWA support
